text: Paulo Nogueira Neto (18 April 1922 – 25 February 2019) was a Brazilian environmentalist and politician. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. Neto was Secretary of the Environment from 1974 to 1986. He helped create a total of of ecological stations and ecological reserves in Brazil. As well as of environmental protection areas. Neto died on 25 February 2019 in São Paulo from pneumonia, aged 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Brazilian environmentalists Category:Politicians from São Paulo
title: Paulo Nogueira Neto
